title: 1 company’s solution turns e-commerce returns into revenue
summary: LoadUp has created a new division called Refurn, which provides online furniture retailers with a sustainable option for their products by creating a circular economy aimed at ending unnecessary waste. Refurn offers revenue generating services, a re-commerce service, and centralized return management for online furniture retailers. This helps businesses reduce costs associated with returned products and provides a more sustainable option for customers.
green_innovation: TRUE; Refurn provides online furniture retailers with a sustainable option for their products by creating a circular economy aimed at ending unnecessary waste.
business_innovation: TRUE; Refurn offers a new revenue generating service for online furniture retailers by allowing them to offer removal, assembly, or installation services to customers.
green_product: TRUE; Refurn helps online furniture retailers reduce waste by providing a re-commerce service that purchases and removes returned items.
green_process: TRUE; Refurn offers a centralized return management service that provides a more sustainable option for customers to return unwanted items.
likely_naics_codes: ['492110 - Couriers', '493110 - General Warehousing and Storage', '493120 - Refrigerated Warehousing and Storage', '493190 - Other Warehousing and Storage']

title: Encompass Selects Blitzz’s App-Free Video Support to Identify Replacement Parts Remotely
summary: Encompass Supply Chain Solutions, a leading national provider of replacement parts and supply chain services, is using Blitzz's live video support technology for quick and easy replacement part identification. Blitzz's app-free video support software allows Encompass support agents to see through a customer's smartphone camera, identify model numbers, and collaborate via an interactive video call without downloading third-party apps. Encompass is now able to identify parts the first time a customer reaches out for assistance, reducing guesswork, callbacks, and processing time.
product_or_process: Live video support technology for remote customer support

title: Happy Returns has selected Loop as its preferred returns portal partner for Shopify brands
summary: Loop and Happy Returns, a UPS company, have announced an expanded partnership to provide retail merchants with the most comprehensive combination of returns software and consolidation solutions available. With this expanded partnership, Loop is now Happy Returns’ preferred returns portal partner for Shopify brands. At the same time, Loop is excited to recommend Happy Returns as their preferred partner for in-person, box-free, label-free returns.

title: India Vs China: Factors Driving ReCommerce And The Road Ahead
summary: The article discusses the ReCommerce sector of used goods, especially electronic gadgets, in China and India. It highlights the growth opportunities and challenges in the Indian ReCommerce market, which is currently unorganized and has a huge untapped supply of used smartphones. The growth of the ReCommerce sector in India is expected to bridge the digital divide and reduce e-waste.

title: Myntra is luring its customers with additional discounts — but there’s a catch
summary: Myntra, a Flipkart subsidiary, is offering additional discounts to customers who opt for a 'no return' policy. This move is aimed at reducing the high number of returns on ordered items, which can reach up to 20%. Myntra hopes that the offer will benefit both the company and its customers, as some of the savings on reverse logistics will be passed on to customers.
